@hintonburg Karla! I just sent an email to @runottawa @OttawaMarathon to thank you! I was so broken when you came and even though I missed my goal I wouldnâ€™t have finished without you!! Thank you so much! I will do that for another runner in future!

I could never tag everyone I need to thank but hopefully you know who you are! Thank you for getting me to finish the marathon today in a pb. Missed my goal but I know I will beat it next time! And 25th in my age group is still pretty good! https://t.co/w47ibfbrsA
The extra mile crew at @runottawa was literally the reason I finished today! Thank you for being there. I will pay it back and do it for others in future!

@Mikeggibbs Our system is a representative democracy, so you should vote for the best person to represent your riding. Voters AND MPs/MPPs seem to forget that and put party above constituents. I vote for the person I think will speak for my riding.
